attributes.action: prevent accountants operating without being member or regulating body
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To prevent accountants failing in their committment to act on one's behalf,without any form of redress

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Accountants/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
